text:
I was treated by Dr Prem Pillay for my fractured spine after a fall.  He explained the various options of treatment in detail and he was so patient with me.  I was initially hesitant to proceed with the treatment, but finally went through as I was in great pain.  I made the right decision as my spine has recovered and I am now pain free.
I'm very happy and satisfied to be under his care. Kudos to Dr Prem Pillay and his team.
Dr Prem Pillay is a kind, knowledgeable and caring doctor who treated my mum's spine fracture and helped her to walk normally again. Thank you, Dr Pillay!
He is highly experience and gives an honest opinion.He always  suggest minimal invasive procedures.
